reporter_caption.center: RICHARDSON v. FIRST COAST COUNSELING, 920 So.2d 4 (Fla.App. 1 Dist. 2006)

caption.center: LARRY T. RICHARDSON, Appellant, v. FIRST COAST COUNSELING and EDUCATION

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from an order of the Circuit Court for Duval County, Judge Jack M. Schemer.
opinion.attorneys:
P. Daniel Williams and Archibald J. Thomas, III, of Archibald J. Thomas, III P.A., Jacksonville, for Appellant.
Betsy S. Holton, Jacksonville, for Appellee First Coast Counseling.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
BARFIELD, WOLF, and BROWNING, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.
